attributes.title: Welcome to Hell - #135
attributes.caption: If you want to go to Heaven then you may want to skip the season 12 premiere of On The Spot.
attributes.description: Jon has Hell to pay and Trevor performs miracles before your very eyes. If you want to go to Heaven then you may want to skip the season 12 premiere of On The Spot. attributes.title: Hell Freezes Over - 146
attributes.caption: Battle Buddies Ryan and Jeremy swoop in to save Clayton, who must face his brother Satan in a completely wild live show during RTX Austin 2018. Also everyone makes out at some point.
attributes.description: Battle Buddies Ryan and Jeremy swoop in to save Clayton, who must face his brother Satan in a season finale boss battle during a completely wild live show at RTX Austin 2018. Also everyone makes out at some point. Sponsored by Dollar Shave Club (http://bit.ly/2zQ61Xb), SimpliSafe (http://bit.ly/2JuJ6IC), and Blue Apron (http://cook.ba/1V1MMMd).
